title: Fantasy Realms Music Cinematic PRO
description: Enter a world of fantasy, wonders and adventures in this cinematic collection of orchestral tracks.
longDescription:
Click here to listen to the album preview


Glimmering wisps, shy fairies, deep woods and colossal towers in the distance would depict an appropriate picture for the music within this collection. Soaring orchestral flourishes accompanied by gentle flutes and intimate guitar accents, all packaged in a sense of adventure, yet also touching, emotional moments. Fitting for fantasy settings, adventure-driven games.


12 cinematic tracks spanning 25 minutes of original music, ranging from grand, triumphant tones to emotional, suave themes.


Since the nature of the material is based on themes/melodies, this is excellent for cutscene/cinematic content, menu music, credit rolls, and to some extent in-game background music.


Award-winning composer for video games and films, Lex is a game lover to the core, and his wish is to fuse them with his love for music, therefore if you desire to collaborate or have any inquiries/custom requests, don't hesitate to contact at resonantinfinity@gmail.com, or browse his profile for more awesome music.


A toast to creativity!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  AAA quality, professionally mixed and mastered tracks
  •  Original, orchestral-driven music
  •  Fantasy vibe throughout

Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 25

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
